
module: Cisco-IOS-XE-zone
  augment /ios:native/ios:zone:
    +--rw security* [id]
       +--rw id             string
       +--rw description?   string
       +--rw protection?    -> /ios:native/parameter-map/type/ios-policy:inspect-zone/name
       +--rw vpn* [id]
          +--rw id    uint32
  augment /ios:native/ios:zone-pair:
    +--rw security* [id]
       +--rw id                string
       +--rw source            string
       +--rw destination       string
       +--rw description?      string
       +--rw service-policy
          +--rw type
             +--rw inspect?   -> /ios:native/policy/ios-policy:policy-map/name
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:Ethernet:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:FastEthernet:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:GigabitEthernet:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:TenGigabitEthernet:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:FiveGigabitEthernet:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:AppGigabitEthernet:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:TwentyFiveGigabitEthernet:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:TwentyFiveGigE:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:FortyGigabitEthernet:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:HundredGigE:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:LISP:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:TwoGigabitEthernet:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:Loopback:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:Tunnel:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:Virtual-Template:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:Vlan:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:vasileft:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:vasiright:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:VirtualPortGroup:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:BDI:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  augment /ios:native/ios:interface/ios:BD-VIF:
    +--rw zone-member
       +--rw security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id

  grouping config-interface-zone-member-grouping
    +-- zone-member
       +-- security?   -> /ios:native/zone/ios-zone:security/id
  grouping config-zone-grouping
    +-- security* [id]
       +-- id?            string
       +-- description?   string
       +-- protection?    -> /ios:native/parameter-map/type/ios-policy:inspect-zone/name
       +-- vpn* [id]
          +-- id?   uint32
  grouping config-zone-pair-grouping
    +-- security* [id]
       +-- id?               string
       +-- source            string
       +-- destination       string
       +-- description?      string
       +-- service-policy
          +-- type
             +-- inspect?   -> /ios:native/policy/ios-policy:policy-map/name
